alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Hudspeth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued October 20 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THIS IS A STATEWIDE CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK THE RAINS COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IS SEARCHING FOR ETHAN DONNELLEY, WHITE, MALE, 2 YEARS OLD, BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING UNKNOWN CLOTHING. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR SYLVIA LOPEZ, 36 YEARS OLD, WHITE, FEMALE, 5 FEET, 8 INCHES TALL, 200 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES AND LAST SEEN WEARING UNKNOWN CLOTHING, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A BLUE, 2010, VOLKSWAGEN JETTA BEARING TEXAS LICENSE PLATE NUMBER S B L 1 6 2 8. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN IN POINT, TEXAS LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE RAINS COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE AT 9 0 3 4 7 3 3 1 8 1. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS RAINS COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE AT 9 0 3 4 7 3 3 1 8 1.
